Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus

Class MonitoringBorkerEX

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.DatacenterBroker
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.DatacenterBrokerEX
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.MonitoringBorkerEX
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
WebBroker
public class MonitoringBorkerEX extends DatacenterBrokerEX
A broker which measures the utilisation of its VMs. This broker only measures the utilisation of vms of type MonitoredVMex. VMs of other types are processed as usual, and their utilisation is not measured.

Additionally the broker performs autoscaling periodically in accordance with the specified IAutoscalingPolicy.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

  • Constructor Details

    • MonitoringBorkerEX

      public MonitoringBorkerEX(String name, double lifeLength, double monitoringPeriod, double autoScalePeriod) throws Exception
      Constr.
      Parameters:
      name - - the name of the broker.
      lifeLength - - for how long we need to keep this broker alive. If -1, then the broker is kept alive/running untill all cloudlets complete.
      monitoringPeriod - - the period between subsequent measurements.
      autoScalePeriod - - the period between subsequent autoscalings.
      Throws:
      Exception - - from the superclass.

  • Method Details

      public List<IAutoscalingPolicy> getAutoscalingPolicies()

    • addAutoScalingPolicy

      public void addAutoScalingPolicy(IAutoscalingPolicy policy)
      Adds a new autoscaling policy, which is executed upon each new VM utilisation measurment.
      Parameters:
      policy - - the new policy to add. Must not be null.

    • recordUtilisation

      public void recordUtilisation(List<Double> utilRecordTimes)
      Sets times, for which the utilisations of all VMs will be recorded. for each of these times, the utilisations of all VMs will be recorded. Used mostly for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      utilRecordTimes - - times for which the VM utilisations should be recorded. Used for testing purposes. The times must be positive.

    • recordUtilisationPeriodically

      public void recordUtilisationPeriodically(double period)
      Sets the period between VM utilisation measurements records. Used mostly for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      period - - the period between subsequent VM utilisation measurements are recorded. Must be positive.

    • processEvent

      public void processEvent(SimEvent ev)
      Description copied from class: SimEntity
      Processes events or services that are available for the entity. This method is invoked by the CloudSim class whenever there is an event in the deferred queue, which needs to be processed by the entity.
      Overrides:

      Parameters:

    • processOtherEvent

      protected void processOtherEvent(SimEvent ev)
      Description copied from class: DatacenterBroker
      Process non-default received events that aren't processed by the DatacenterBroker.processEvent(org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEvent) method. This method should be overridden by subclasses in other to process new defined events.
      Overrides:
      processOtherEvent in class DatacenterBrokerEX
      Parameters:
      ev - a SimEvent object

    • getRecordedUtilisations

      public LinkedHashMap<Double,Map<Integer,double[]>> getRecordedUtilisations()
      Returns the recorded utilisations. The resulting map's entries are in the format [time, Map[vm-id, Array[cpu-util, ram-util, io-util]]] .
      Returns:
      the recorded utilisations. The resulting map's entries are in the format [time, Map[vm-id, Array[cpu-util, ram-util, io-util]]] .
